verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician אַל־ תַּשְׁחֵ֑ת <WH516> Altaschith מִזְמ֖וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> of Asaph שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> [or] Song ה֘וֹדִ֤ינוּ <WH3034> do we give thanks לְּךָ֨ ׀ אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> Unto thee O God ה֭וֹדִינוּ <WH3034> [unto thee] do we give thanks וְקָר֣וֹב <WH7138> is near שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> for [that] thy name סִ֝פְּר֗וּ <WH5608> declare נִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6381> thy wondrous works
כִּ֭י <WH3588> When אֶקַּ֣ח <WH3947> When I shall receive מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> the congregation אֲ֝נִ֗י <WH589> I מֵישָׁרִ֥ים <WH4339> uprightly אֶשְׁפֹּֽט׃ <WH8199> I will judge

נְֽמֹגִ֗ים <WH4127> thereof are dissolved אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> The earth וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> and all the inhabitants אָנֹכִ֨י <WH595> is I תִכַּ֖נְתִּי <WH8505> I bear up עַמּוּדֶ֣יהָ <WH5982> the pillars סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> of it Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> I said לַֽ֭הוֹלְלִים <WH1984> unto the fools אַל־ <WH408> not תָּהֹ֑לּוּ <WH1984> Deal not foolishly וְ֝לָרְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> and to the wicked אַל־ <WH408> not תָּרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> Lift not up קָֽרֶן׃ <WH7161> the horn
אַל־ <WH408> not תָּרִ֣ימוּ <WH7311> Lift not up לַמָּר֣וֹם <WH4791> on high קַרְנְכֶ֑ם <WH7161> your horn תְּדַבְּר֖וּ <WH1696> speak בְצַוָּ֣אר <WH6677> neck עָתָֽק׃ <WH6277> [not with] a stiff

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor מִ֭מּוֹצָא <WH4161> [cometh] neither from the east וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> nor from the west וְ֝לֹ֗א <WH3808> Nor מִמִּדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> nor from the south הָרִֽים׃ <WH7311> exaltation
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> But אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> But God שֹׁפֵ֑ט <WH8199> [is] the judge זֶ֥ה <WH2088> one יַ֝שְׁפִּ֗יל <WH8213> he putteth down וְזֶ֣ה <WH2088> another יָרִֽים׃ <WH7311> one and setteth up

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For כ֪וֹס <WH3563> [there is] a cup בְּֽיַד־ <WH3027> For in the hand יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְיַ֤יִן <WH3196> and the wine חָמַ֨ר ׀ <WH2560> is red מָ֥לֵא <WH4392> it is full מֶסֶךְ֮ <WH4538> of mixture וַיַּגֵּ֪ר <WH5064> and he poureth out מִ֫זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> of the same אַךְ־ <WH389> Surely שְׁ֭מָרֶיהָ <WH8105> but the dregs יִמְצ֣וּ <WH4680> shall wring [them] out יִשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> [and] drink כֹּ֝֗ל <WH3605> all רִשְׁעֵי־ <WH7563> thereof all the wicked אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
וַ֭אֲנִי <WH589> I אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> But I will declare לְעֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever אֲ֝זַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> I will sing praises לֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> to the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all קַרְנֵ֣י <WH7161> All the horns רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked אֲגַדֵּ֑עַ <WH1438> also will I cut off תְּ֝רוֹמַ֗מְנָה <WH7311> shall be exalted קַֽרְנ֥וֹת <WH7161> [but] the horns צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> of the righteous
